#summary Some ways to update data on the database.
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

There is a few ways to update data on the database. There is a way for single row update and multiple rows update.

= Updating a table row =

{{{
update mytable
{
    where (name = "John") name = "Peter";
}
}}}

= Updating multiple columns in a single row =

{{{
update mytable
{
    where (name = "John")
    {
        name = "Peter";
        age = 42;
    }
}
}}}

= Updating multiple rows =

{{{
update mytable
{
    where (age >= 42)
    {
        position = "Senior";
    }
}
}}}

== Multiple conditions ==

{{{
update mytable
{
    where (name is "^J") // Starts with 'J'
    {
        team = "The Jays";
    }
    where (surname is "Smith") // surname contains "Smith"
    {
        team = "The Agents";
    }
}
}}}

= Updating all rows =

{{{
update mytable
{
    access = "user";
}
}}}
